data.description:
Do you want to dive into a fishing experience or just sit back and relax in a mesmerizing scenery? Real VR Fishing lets you feel the taste of fishing and relax in real-world fishing spots. Go fishing and catch various species, and fill your aquarium.

REALISTIC FISHING EXPERIENCE
Real VR Fishing provides different difficulties for both anglers and non-anglers. Turn off UI display when you are ready for a real challenge.

FILL AND DECORATE YOUR AQUARIUM
Enjoy collecting and watching your freshwater & saltwater fishes in your aquariums. Customize your aquariums with unique decorations.

ENJOY MUSIC AND VIDEOS
Relax listening to Spotify (Beta) and watching Youtube videos while playing the game. 

"Real VR Fishing Brings Stunning Environments To Quest" - Upload VR
"Real VR Fishing is highly recommended for anglers and non-anglers alike." - 6DOF Reviews

"Rift best sports and fitness game of the year 2019" - Oculus
"Best recreation app of the year 2019" - Quest On

changelog.change_log:
RVRF Go 1.310 Patch Notes

- Season is closed. All users receive all the season gloves
- The issue of turtles disappearing from the aquarium has been fixed.
- The issue of screenshots not being shared has been fixed.
- The height setting value will be saved so that players don't need to adjust it every time they restart the game.

- Top 10 rankers from Season 6 will receive a medal and gloves as a reward. The medal is located next to the TV, and the gloves can be found in the "Tackle" menu.

- The issue that season medals were mislocated has been fixed.

1. Season 4 ends on 00:00 June 5th (PST). New fishing glove and medal will be given as a reward to the top 10 rankers.
2. The price for the saltwater boat and saltwater aquarium has been reduced to 2000 credits and 3000 credits, respectively.
3.  Level of difficulty has been reduced when fighting the fish in HARD and EXPERT mode
4. Other minor bug has been fixed.

1. A bug when purchasing the furniture has been fixed
2. Increased Chance (Percentage) for shark to appear
3. Drop of gauge reduced when failing to respond to the fish jump
4. Other minor bugs have been fixed.

**### "UX update" our 2nd major update is released.**

**Update notes**

- We are introducing a "Web-based media player (beta)" for the first time. While playing the game, you can bring up a multimedia screen, watching Youtube, and adding your favorite websites. (Some sites are not supported.) We plan to enhance the overall UX and functionality based on your feedback.

- RVRF now supports English, German, French, Japanese, Spanish and Korean.

- The tutorial is updated. You can now learn how to play through the new tutorial.

- Two new saltwater achievements are added with sea turtle and gloves as rewards.

- Overhauled overall UI and changed it to a holographic interface.

- In a fishing spot, a fishing rod gets placed in a rod holder when you bring up a menu screen (press the menu button on your left controller). To grab the fishing rod, point towards the rod and press the trigger button.

- You can bring up the menu and multimedia screen at the lodge.

- You can check the current time and battery states for HMD from the menu screen.

- A multi-language keyboard is now available. Japanese and Korean keyboards will be supported in the future update.

-The condition for a shark to appear has been changed. A shark appears with a certain probability while you are fishing small or medium-sized saltwater fishes in every saltwater stage.

-The number of sharks required for the shark achievement has been reduced. And the sharks that have already been caught are counted for the achievement.

- A striped marlin has been changed from a rare fish to a normal fish.

- Mp3 files with bit rates higher than 192 Kbps and sample rates higher than 44100 Hz can have playback issues.

Update notes
1. Fixed a music player bug
2. Leaderboard now loads faster
3. Line slack difficulty has been adjusted
4. Fixed few minor bugs

Update notes

1. The player level will be capped at 20. The credit cap will be the same as before (99,999).
2. Five new saltwater stages are added. You can unlock saltwater locations when you reach level 16 and need to buy a boat to play offshore stages (18-20).
3. Four new saltwater tackles are added (Spinning Reel & Rod / Baitcasting Reel & Rod). Saltwater specific metal Jig lure is also available.
4. 22 new marine species are added (Sea turtle can be unlocked by achievement only). You can fish large fish like Tiger Shark, Striped Marlin, Mahi Mahi and four more.
5. A new basement aquarium is added for saltwater species. You need to buy it under the rooms category from the store at the current lodge.
6. Season 2 will be ended as soon as the update rolls out(20th of January 12:00 AM PST). Winners will get gloves and a medal according to their ranking. No physical trophy at this time.
7. The water shader is replaced. 
8. Auto Cloud Save is now available. Your progress will be automatically saved if you turn this feature on. *Warning* If you use multiple devices, your progress can be overridden.
